name: Square Word: Hello Winter!❄️
description:
Winter is here!!! Let's play!!!

Grab your winter gear and a blanket to enjoy a new SQUARE WORD episode!




ALEX, the little penguin, is very happy to start a new adventure with you!

Four very cool themes: Christmas - Cold - Toyz - Cozy House
140+ words to find.
Handcrafted grids.
Daily challenge.
4 difficulties (easy to very hard).
Difficulty increasing gradually.
Letter & word hints.
Collect Stamps with extra objectives and receive rewards!
Additional songs.


Are you ready?

All Square Word games:
